meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Roxann Smith Anthony Niblett Larry White Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6738.

td.p: Roxann Smith, a professional volunteer from Los Angeles, California
Anthony Niblett, a law professor from Toronto, Ontario, Canada
Larry White, an actuary from Hatboro, Pennsylvania (whose 2-day cash winnings total $49,624)

tr.td: (Alex: You have to tell us what kind of animal.)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'molten (or lava cake)

Roxann
')

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: And his work inspired the popular television series Game of Thrones.)
RoxannWho was Mencken?
$4,998
AnthonyWho is George R R Martin
$8,601
LarryWho is Bradbury?
$3,000
George R.R. Martin')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '"The American Tolkien" was what Time magazine called this author with the same 2 middle initials as Tolkien')

tr.td: "The American Tolkien" was what Time magazine called this author with the same 2 middle initials as Tolkien

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
